summary: An ordinance relating to a judgement against the City of Seattle in the District Court of the U.S. for the Western Districts of Washington, Northern Division, Cause No. 11860 (Jahn et al, Plaintiffs, v. City of Seattle, Defendent, and United States Fidelity & Guaranty Company cross-defendent), authorizing a stipulation for a compromise of, and reduction in the amount of said judgement; providing for the payment thereof as reduced, and appropriating funds therefor.
